actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.
Subcommittee on Transportation. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 102-528.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Related Agencies

official_title: A bill making supplemental appropriations for programs in the fiscal year that ends September 30, 1992, that will provide near-term improvements in the Nation's transportation infrastructure and long-term benefits to those systems and to the productivity of the United States economy.
short_title: Supplemental Transportation Appropriations Reinvestment To Upgrade Productivity (Start-Up) Act of 1992

summary.text: Supplemental Transportation Appropriations Reinvestment To Upgrade Productivity (Start-Up) Act of 1992 - Makes supplemental appropriations for FY 1992 to: (1) the Department of Transportation's Federal Highway Administration and Federal Transit Administration to maintain and repair the Nation's highways and bridges, stimulate economic activity, and expand the efficiency of public transportation systems; (2) the Federal Aviation Administration for airport improvement programs; (3) the Federal Railroad Administration for Northeast Corridor improvements; and (4) the United States Coast Guard.

titles.title: Supplemental Transportation Appropriations Reinvestment To Upgrade Productivity (Start-Up) Act of 1992

A bill making supplemental appropriations for programs in the fiscal year that ends September 30, 1992, that will provide near-term improvements in the Nation's transportation infrastructure and long-term benefits to those systems and to the productivity of the United States economy.
